titles.title: Expressing the condolences of the House of Representatives on the death of the Honorable John P. Murtha, a Representative from the Commonwealth of Pennsylvania.

action.text: DEBATE - The House proceeded with one hour of debate on H. Res. 1084.
The previous question was ordered without objection.

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary: 2/22/2010--Passed House without amendment. Expresses the condolences of the House of Representatives on the death of the Honorable John P. Murtha, a Representative from the Commonwealth of Pennsylvania. Declares that when the House adjourns on February 22, 2010, it stand adjourned as a further mark of respect to the memory of Representative Murtha.
